name: autumn-bot-api
description: API For the autumn bot dashboard
author: Gwen Phalan

scripts.owo: pm2 start --name AutumnBotAPI npm -- run dev --watch --ignore-watch dist/*
scripts.prod: npm run build && export NODE_ENV=production && node .
scripts.dev: npm run build && export NODE_ENV=development && node .
scripts.production: npm run build && export NODE_ENV=production && npm run start
scripts.reinstall: npm run cleanCache && npm run deleteModules && npm run deleteLock && npm run installModules
scripts.start: pm2 start --name AutumnBotAPI npm -- run prod
